message: This is a high-quality product, worth $40000 to you. If you buy it, I'll give you a 25% discount, making it $30000. I'm willing to sell it to you for this price, but only for this round. If you don't buy it, the price will go back to $10000.
I accept your offer and will buy the product for $30000.

I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price as the last round, $30000. But I'll throw in a free inspection report that guarantees the product's quality, so you can be sure you're getting a high-quality item.
I appreciate the free inspection report. I'll buy the product for $30000.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! However, I have to inform you that this product is not of the same quality as the previous two. I'm not offering a discount, but I'm willing to give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. This way, you'll get something extra for your money, even if this product isn't what you were hoping for.
I appreciate the gesture. I'll take the product and the additional benefits.
